Image Super Resolution ISR Please upload the picture and adjust the resolution you need. width: Please upload the picture height: 1PX 3PX Original Tips Before using the image super-resolution service, you need to convert the image into a bitmap in ARGB format, and the output bitmap format is also ARGB. In the 3x super resolution scenario, the maximum size of the input image is 800 x 800 pixels, and the minimum size is not less than 64 x 64 pixels. In the 1x super resolution scenario, the maximum size of an input image is 1024px x 768px or 768px x 1024px, the minimum size is 64px x 64px. The effect is not obvious when the input picture is of good quality and definition.
Text Image Super Resolution TISR Before using the text image super-resolution service, you need to convert the image into a bitmap in ARGB format, and the output bitmap format is also ARGB. Only 3x super resolution is supported. The maximum size of an input image is 800px x 800px, and the minimum size is 64px x 64px. The effect is not obvious when the input picture is of good quality and definition.
